PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_AudioVisualApplianceTypeTuner
PropertySetDef.Definition: An audio-visual tuner is a device that demodulates a signal into a stream of audio and/or video. HISTORY: Added in IFC4.

PropertyDef.Name: TunerChannel
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the tuner channels, if applicable.

PropertyDef.Name: TunerFrequency
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the tuner frequencies, if applicable.

PropertyDef.Name: TunerMode
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the tuner modes (or bands). For example, 'AnalogCable', 'DigitalAir', 'AM', 'FM'.
